summary: Provides a max‑pooling layer that aggregates node features of a single graph or a batch of graphs by selecting the maximum value across all nodes for each feature dimension, yielding a fixed‑size graph representation.
business_intent: Facilitate graph neural network models in extracting concise, graph‑level embeddings from variable‑size node feature sets through a differentiable max‑pooling operation compatible with DGL and PyTorch backends.
